title: ***Location, Location, Location- Flag City Mobile Home Community!***
posting_body: Live the commuters dream in Flag City Mobile Community, stop looking and call us today!
Flag City is conveniently located just 20 minutes from Memphis, Millington offers visitors and residents numerous activities to stay entertained.
Take yourself out to the ball game at the USA Baseball Stadium, a great venue for baseball and softball games.
For the nature lover, a visit to the Meeman-Shelby Forest State Park is sure to impress.
Millington also offers several other parks throughout the area for hiking, camping, canoeing, kayaking and just spending quality time with the family outdoors.
Pets are welcome so bring the whole family!
Come home to Flag City and live the life you deserve.
"Prices and availability are subject to change without notice"
